channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Gun found on suspect in killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO matches shell casings at scene, police say
item.description: New York City’s police commissioner says the gun found on the suspect in the killing of UnitedHealthcare’s CEO matches shell casings found at the crime scene.

item.title: Arguments over whether Luigi Mangione is a ‘hero’ offer a glimpse into an unusual American moment
Biden commutes roughly 1,500 sentences and pardons 39 people in biggest single-day act of clemency
